text:
Here comes Max the monster truck and his friends,
heading for the stadium.

They're going to help us learn to count to
ten today!
Let's count them!

One, Two, Three, Four, Five, Six, Seven, Eight,
Nine, Ten!"

Let's go inside the stadium and jump some
vehicles!
Max goes first, he gets things done!
Watch him jumping over ONE!

Here's a monster truck, sky blue
She doesn't jump just one, but TWO!
And now, whatâ€™s this we see?
A monster truck jumping, one, two, THREE!
Can Yellow Truck do even more?
Look at her go, 1, 2, 3, FOUR!

Purple Truck is ready to drive,
She jumps 1, 2, 3, 4 and FIVE!

This next truck has got some tricks
Not 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 but SIX!
This really is Monster Truck Heaven!

These monster trucks are looking great,
Pink Truck, just jumped over EIGHT!

All the trucks are doing fine,
Green Truck easily clears NINE!

Now it's time to count again
Watch our last truck jump all TEN!
Fantastic Jumping, everyone!
Are you ready to count them again?

One, Two, Three, Four, Five, Six, Seven, Eight,
Nine, Ten!
Ten massive monster trucks!
Thanks for helping us count today!
That was great fun!
To watch more of our videos, click here.

Or to subscribe to Toddler FunLearning, click
here!
See you again soon! Bye!
